Hello world!
Settings

Hello! Iam clari… I can help you to understand your symptoms so you see the right kind of doctor. Although not as smart as google , I can suggest what to do next and tell you what to ask your doctor. Please understand that Iam not a substitute for professional medical advice. Tap OK to agree to the terms of the super awesome nerds who made me!

Are you able to do most of your daily activities despite of your back pain?

you may have a strain or sprain in the ligaments of your back or disc disease

 -> Take rest for a few days but AVOID COMPLETE BED REST

 and

 -> Visit an orthopedics doctor if you don't feel better in a week or if the pain is getting more.
 Your doctor might prescribe painkillers or Dolo 650 3 times a day just before meals
